    public class NonModalDialogBox
extends com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.DialogBox
    Creates a non modal dialog box.

    This Class will be used to create a non modal dialog box which will not lock other events i.e if any other dialog box pops up when this dialog box is visible then the browser will not go to the deadlock state.

    This will ignore the events of the screen behind the dialog box but not the events that will pop up above this.

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Ephesoft
    See Also:
    DialogBox
